services.description: A One-way Mobile Termination service on which customers can't send any response. Useful for Financial Transaction alerts, payment confirmation alerts, marketing & promotion messages, personalized messages, etc.
services.prerequisites: Requires a technical test with the client or Value Added Service Provider (VASP) before commercial operation. Alert_name is assigned in place of numeric Short-Code.

billing_notes: Customers do not need to select a specific slab (tier).
Minimum monthly SMS quota must be sent: 5,000 for private, 1,000 for government.
If minimum quota is not sent, billing is still calculated at the minimum quota (3,000 for private, 1,000 for government).
Billing is done at the rate of the slab the total SMS volume falls into.
The specified amount as Bank Guarantee or Cash Deposit is required (for private companies).

services.description: An interactive SMS service where customers can also send a response or queries on services like Exam Results, Polling, Voting, Quiz services, marketing & promotion messages, etc.
services.prerequisites: Requires technical tests and NTA approval before commercial operation. A numeric short-code is assigned for the client or VASP.

services.description: A broadcast service where several customers get the same message from the sending party. Suitable for organizations like schools, colleges, business houses, SMEs, or other organizations that wish to send the same message to several customers simultaneously.
services.advantages: Highly subsidized cost, ease of use, and less time to implement.
services.implementation_note: Does not require any technical test and can be started within a working day. An alphanumeric code is assigned to the client.
portal_features: Users can upload phone contacts in an Excel sheet (1000 numbers at one time).
Cost is inclusive of all application taxes.

rates.purchase_note: Web Based Bulk SMS is purchased in advance. The minimum quota (1,500 SMS) or the amount for the chosen slab, including tax, must be paid upfront to the designated bank account. After payment, the corresponding SMS quota and the validity period are added to the account. Incremental Basis is not applied.

subscription_methods.instruction: Type SUB and send SMS to 1455

song_purchase_methods.instruction: Dial 1455 & follow categories (Top10, Nepali Songs, etc.), select song for all or special callers. Unsubscribe also available.
Dial *1455#, follow categories, check list, select song. Unsubscribe also available.
Type 'Sub Song_Key_Word' (e.g., Sub 0692xxx) and send SMS to 1455. Send TOP to 1455 to see Top Songs.
Dial *9 to copy and set your ringtone when you hear a nice ringtone while calling others.

unsubscription_methods.instruction: Type UNSUB and Send SMS to 1455

services.note: IVR Call is free for up to 3 minutes; local call tariff applies after 3 minutes. Weekly subscription is a fallback option if balance is insufficient for monthly subscription.

services.description: Sapati Service for Prepaid Customers offering credit for calls.
features: NO CALL DROP, NO EXTRA CHARGES.
Payment of debt is taken from the next top-up.
Partial recovery if top-up is less than total debt (threshold is 60%).
services.eligibility: Available only to prepaid users who have used the Prepaid Service for 3 or more months. Credit amount depends on network usage, recharge frequency/amount, and SIM card age.
